attributes.action: Stop the 2nd referendum for Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron said "one vote only" (not 2)

Scotland are part of the UK.

It was the once in a lifetime vote therefore it should be stopped.
attributes.background:
In 2014 Scotland had a referendum on independence from the UK, They voted remain. They are part of the UK and should not be allowed another referendum.
We are better together.
